author: Kortholt, Christian, 1633-1694
title: Christiani Kortholti ... De canone Scripturæ Sacræ tractatus Roberto Card. Bellarmino, hujusq; defensori Jacobo Gretsero, et vindicatori nupero, Vito Erbermanno, Jesuitis, oppositus, atque in Academia Rostochiensi publicis aliquot disputationibus proposit
